delete.description: Remove a recipient group (committee, project, or foundation) from survey and recalculate statistics (proxies to ITX DELETE /v2/surveys/{survey_uid}/recipient_group)

parameters.description: Committee UID to remove (indicates specific committee in project)

parameters.name: project_uid
